title: Pbe sign ups?
body: When are the Pbe sign ups going to be open again

replies.body: I don't quite have an exact date for when those signups will be open again, but you can stay on top of it by checking our [**news page**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news) as well as the [**PBE Status Page**](http://status.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/#pbe).
